briefdescription.para: Delete all stored GUI control names.
Name of the specified GUI control.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of GUI control names.

simplesect.para: The control name storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of names that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A null-terminated string.

simplesect.para: The passed in name is copied, which will involve an additional allocation.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored raw control names.
Name of the specified raw control.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of raw control names.

simplesect.para: The control name storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of names that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A null-terminated string.

simplesect.para: The passed in name is copied, which will involve an additional allocation.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored joint names.
Name of the specified joint.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of joint names.

simplesect.para: The joint name storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of names that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A null-terminated string.

simplesect.para: The passed in name is copied, which will involve an additional allocation.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored joint indices.
Store a list of joint indices onto a specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A position in a zero-indexed array where joint indices are stored.

simplesect.para: The index denotes the position of an entire joint index list, not the position of it's individual elements, i.e. the row index in a 2D matrix of joint indices.
The joint index storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of joint indices that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The source address from which the joint indices are to be copied.

simplesect.para: These indices can be used to access joint names through DefinitionReader::getJointName.

parameterdescription.para: The number of joint indices to copy.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored LOD to joint list index mapping entries.
Set which joints belong to which level of detail.

parameterdescription.para: The actual level of detail to which the joints are being associated.
The index onto which joints indices were assigned using setJointIndices.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored blend shape channel names.
Name of the specified blend shape channel.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape channel names.

simplesect.para: The blend shape channel name storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of names that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A null-terminated string.

simplesect.para: The passed in name is copied, which will involve an additional allocation.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored blend shape channel indices.
Store a list of blend shape channel name indices onto a specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A position in a zero-indexed array where blend shape channel name indices are stored.

simplesect.para: The index denotes the position of an entire blend shape channel index list, not the position of it's individual elements, i.e. the row index in a 2D matrix of blend shape channel indices.
The blend shape channel index storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of blend shape channel name indices that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The source address from which the blend shape channel name indices are to be copied.

simplesect.para: These indices can be used to access blend shape channel names through DefinitionReader::getBlendShapeChannelName.

parameterdescription.para: The number of blend shape channel name indices to copy.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored LOD to blend shape channel list index mapping entries.
Set which blend shape channels belong to which level of detail.

parameterdescription.para: The actual level of detail to which the blend shape channels are being associated.
The index onto which blend shape channel name indices were assigned using setBlendShapeChannelIndices.

simplesect.para: The LOD indices set here are not interchangeable with the LOD values set in BehaviorWriter::setBlendShapeChannelLODs.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored animated map names.
Name of the specified animated map.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of animated map names.

simplesect.para: The animated map name storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of names that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A null-terminated string.

simplesect.para: The passed in name is copied, which will involve an additional allocation.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored animated map indices.
Store a list of animated map name indices onto a specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A position in a zero-indexed array where animated map name indices are stored.

simplesect.para: The index denotes the position of an entire animated map index list, not the position of it's individual elements, i.e. the row index in a 2D matrix of animated map indices.
The animated map index storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of animated map name indices that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The source address from which the animated map name indices are to be copied.

simplesect.para: These indices can be used to access animated map names through DefinitionReader::getAnimatedMapName.

parameterdescription.para: The number of animated map name indices to copy.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored LOD to animated map list index mapping entries.
Set which animated maps belong to which level of detail.

parameterdescription.para: The actual level of detail to which the animated maps are being associated.
The index onto which animated map indices were assigned using setAnimatedMapIndices.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored mesh names.
Name of the specified mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A name's position in the zero-indexed array of mesh names.

simplesect.para: The mesh name storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of names that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A null-terminated string.

simplesect.para: The passed in name is copied, which will involve an additional allocation.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored mesh indices.
Store a list of mesh name indices onto a specified index.

parameterdescription.para: A position in a zero-indexed array where mesh name indices are stored.

simplesect.para: The index denotes the position of an entire mesh index list, not the position of it's individual elements, i.e. the row index in a 2D matrix of mesh indices.
The mesh index storage will be implicitly resized (if needed) to provide storage for the number of mesh name indices that is inferred from the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The source address from which the mesh name indices are to be copied.

simplesect.para: These indices can be used to access mesh names through DefinitionReader::getMeshName.

parameterdescription.para: The number of mesh name indices to copy.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored LOD to mesh list index mapping entries.
Set which meshes belong to which level of detail.

parameterdescription.para: The actual level of detail to which the meshes are being associated.
The index onto which mesh indices were assigned using setMeshIndices.

briefdescription.para: Delete all stored mesh to blend shape channel mapping entries.
Associate a blend shape channel with it's mesh.

parameterdescription.para: A mapping's position in the zero-indexed array of mesh-blend shape channel mappings.
A mesh's position in the zero-indexed array of mesh names.
A blend shape channel's position in the zero-indexed array of blend shape channel names.

briefdescription.para: A simple array describing the parent-child relationships between joints.

simplesect.para:
Example: Joint names: [A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H] Hierarchy: [0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 4, 2, 2] Describes the following hierarchy: A
B | + D | + E | + F
C
G
H

parameterdescription.para: The source address from which the joint indices are to be copied.

simplesect.para: These indices can be used to access joint names through DefinitionReader::getJointName.

parameterdescription.para: The number of joint indices to copy.
The source address from which the translations are to be copied.
The number of translation values to copy.
The source address from which the rotations are to be copied.
The number of rotation values to copy.

briefdescription.para: Write-only accessors for DNA attributes that represent the rig's static data.

simplesect.para: Implementors should inherit from Writer itself and not this class.
